text: Easiest way is to create a private app.  Go to Settings->Integrations->Private Apps and create a private app.  This will give you an API key for that app.  You need to add the proper scopes your app will need to use.  For reading and writing contacts you'll want crm.objects.contacts.read and crm.objects.contacts.write.  Get information on the calls you want to use from the api at <https://developers.HubSpot.com/>
